entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:17 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
